must_be_max: %f.one: field must have less than %f character
must_be_max: %f.other: field must have less than %f characters

must_be_min: %f.one: field must have more than %f character
must_be_min: %f.other: field must have more than %f characters

must_be_more_than_or_equal: %f: value must be more than or equal %f
must_be_less_than_or_equal: %f: value must be less than or equal %f
not_an_alpha_space: field must have letters and spaces only
not_an_alpha_dash: field must have letters and dashes only
not_an_alpha_symbol: field must have letters and symbols only
not_an_alpha_numeric: field must have letters and numbers only
not_an_alpha_numeric_space: field must have letters, numbers and spaces only
not_an_alpha_numeric_dash: field must have letters, numbers and dashes only
not_an_alpha_numeric_symbol: field must have letters, numbers and symbols only
not_a_numeric: field must have an integer number
not_a_numeric_float: field must have a decimal number
not_a_numeric_dash: field must have numbers and dashes only
not_a_numeric_symbol: field must have numbers and symbols only
not_in_the_select_list: selected value must be in the list
not_in_the_radio_list: selected value must be in the list
not_in_the_checkbox_list: selected value must be in the list
not_a_tel: field must be a telephone number
